function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Low adherence to self-protection measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate effect on reducing peak value of infections","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Self-protection measures do not fundamentally cut off the path of spread of the virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in intervention time leading to deviation from actual epidemic curve","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of self-protection measures on the spread of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mild effect on reducing the peak value of covid-19 infections","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of self-protection measures under strict quarantine measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unimaginable amount of self-protection resources needed to achieve ideal results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate hospital isolation measures leading to increased spread of covid-19","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate number of medical beds for infected individuals","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective self-protection measures under strict quarantine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient intervention time for designating hospitals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectively quarantined cases in the crowds","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitation in the number of medical beds","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective hospital isolation measures leading to a large number of undetected or ineffectively quarantined cases","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of medical beds","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving the required number of medical beds","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Medical beds reaching full capacity leading to a large-scale outbreak","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Epidemic spreading to pre-intervention levels after a short period of containment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Study of covid-19 interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Model validation under covid-19 interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate quarantine measures and lockdown implementation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difference between free spread trend of covid-19 in wuhan and early data from other countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Errors in case detection and data recording in wuhan","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Obvious difference between population distribution and actual situation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete data related to epidemic cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in geographical environmental factors","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex natural and social factors influencing epidemic prevention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difference between estimated covid-19 trend and actual trend in wuhan","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difference between population distribution and actual situation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in geographical environmental factors impacting the effectiveness of covid-19 prevention and control measures","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data on spatiotemporal attributes such as patients’ tracking data, residents’ activity data, passengers’ travel data of buses and subways, and mobile location data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Difficulty in obtaining data in a public health safety emergency, which usually features missing or incomplete coverage","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on a generalized model without simulation for the fine-grained location of patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of detailed epidemic data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Problems with scientific verification of spread models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilizing multi-source data, such as network news data, global event databases, and remote sensing data, may pose privacy and data security risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mapping socioeconomic data and grid areas may raise concerns about the misuse of economic and resource allocation information.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analyzing crowd aggregation and interaction may lead to an increased risk of disease propagation if not handled carefully.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hospital isolation measures were effective in reducing the number of infected humans but had a small effect on the arrival time of the maximum number of infected humans and the duration of the covid-19 outbreak.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Self-protection measures were effective in reducing the number of infected humans and delaying the arrival of the peak number of infected humans, but had little effect under stricter quarantine measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The study analyzed the impact of quarantine, self-protection, and hospital isolation measures to slow the spread of covid-19, with high interpretability and geographical mapping of model parameters for practical intervention significance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Incomplete data on reported cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reference to external sources without context","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 globally","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through respiratory system","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain origin of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viral infections caused by coronaviruses continue to emerge and pose a severe public health problem.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Highly contagious nature and relatively long incubation period of sars-cov-2 can lead to silent carriers and high basic reproductive number for covid-19 virus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Susceptibility of sars-cov-2 to heat and ultraviolet uv light may affect virus transmission under certain conditions.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"}]}
